title: The Medieval Islamic Civilization - C. 20 (Thought, Philosophy 5
description:
The Medieval Islamic Civilization - Collection 20 (Thought, Philosophy 5):

We have 31 titles here:

-  al-Baghdadi & Seeley - Moslem Schisms and Sects; History of the Various Philosophic Systems Developed in Islam, Part I (1920)

-  al-Baghdadi & Halkin - Moslem Schisms and Sects; History of the Various Philosophic Systems Developed in Islam, Part II (1955)

-  al-Ghazali - Inner Dimensions of Islamic Worship (1983)

-  Al-Ghazali & Marmura - The Incoherence of the Philosophers; a Parallel English-Arabic Text.. (1997)

-  Attar - The Vital Roots of European Enlightenment; Ibn Tufayl's Influence on Modern Western Thought (2007)

-  Bashier - The Story of Islamic Philosophy; Ibn Tufayl, al-'Arabi, and Others on the Limit between Naturalism and Traditionalism (2011)

-  Bertolacci - The Reception of Aristotle's Metaphysics in Avicenna's Kitab al-Sifa; a Milestone of Western Metaphysical Thought (2006)

-  Burckhardt & Stoddart - Mirror of the Intellect; Essays on Traditional Science & Sacred Art (1987)

-  Crone - Medieval Islamic Political Thought (2004)

-  Daiber - Islamic Thought in the Dialogue of Cultures; a Historical and Bibliographical Survey (2012)

-  Daiber et al (Eds.) - Islamic Philosophy, Theology and Science; Texts and Studies (2016)

-  Eaton - Islam and the Destiny of Man (1994)

-  Korangy et al (Eds.) - Essays in Islamic Philology, History, and Philosophy (2016)

-  Kukkonen - Ibn Tufayl; No Man is an Island (2014)

-  Lambton - State and Government in Medieval Islam; an Introduction to the Study of Islamic Political Theory (1981)

-  Lazarus-Yafeh - Interwined Worlds; Medieval Islam and Bible Criticism (1992)

-  Nasr - Three Muslim Sages; Avicenna - Suhrawards - Ibn 'Arabi (1964)

-  Ormsby - Ghazali; the Revival of Islam (2008)

-  Reisman - The Making of the Avicennan Tradition; The Transmission, Contents, and Structure of Ibn Sina al-Mubahatat (2002)

-  Reisman (Ed.) - Before and After Avicenna; Prod. 1st Conf. Avicenna Study Group (2003)

-  Said - Ghazali's Politics in Context (2013)

-  Sharif (Ed.) - A History of Muslim Philosophy, Vol. 1 (1963)

-  Sharif (Ed.) - A History of Muslim Philosophy, Vol. 2 (1966)

-  Shehadi - Metaphysics in Islamic Philosophy (1982)

-  Shihadeh - The Theological Ethics of Fakhr al-Din al-Razi (2006)

-  Tahiri - Mathematics and the Mind; an Introduction into Ibn Sina's Theory of Knowledge (2016)

-  Tamer (Ed.) - Islam and Rationality; the Impact of al-Ghazali; Papers Collected on His 900th Anniversary (2015)

-  Taylor & Lopez-Farjeat (Eds.) - The Routledge Companion to Islamic Philosophy (2016)

-  Walbridge - The Leaven of the Ancients; Suhrawardi and the Heritage of the Greeks (2000)

-  Yaran - Islamic Thought on the Existence of God; Contributions and Contrast with Contemporary Western Philosophy of Religion (2003)

-  Zakzouk - On Philosophy, Culture, and Peace in Islam (2004)
